mapper.insert: insert into customers (CustomerID, CustomerName, CustomerShortName, pyCode, Contactname, Contacttitle, EmployeeID, Address, CityID, ProvinceID, Zip, Phone, Fax, Email, HomePage, Bankname, Bankaccount, certificateno, eowner, Taxpayerno, Filepath, Filename, CategoryId, Notes ) values (#{customerid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{customername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customershortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contacttitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{homepage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificateno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eowner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxpayerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{notes,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update customers set CustomerName = #{customername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CustomerShortName = #{customershortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pyCode = #{pycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Contactname = #{contactname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Contacttitle = #{contacttitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EmployeeID = #{employeeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CityID = #{cityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ProvinceID = #{provinceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Zip = #{zip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HomePage = #{homepage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Bankname = #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Bankaccount = #{bankaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certificateno = #{certificateno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eowner = #{eowner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Taxpayerno = #{taxpayerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Filepath = #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Filename = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CategoryId = #{categoryid,jdbcType=CHAR}, Notes = #{notes,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where CustomerID = #{customerid,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select CustomerID, CustomerName, CustomerShortName, pyCode, Contactname, Contacttitle, EmployeeID, Address, CityID, ProvinceID, Zip, Phone, Fax, Email, HomePage, Bankname, Bankaccount, certificateno, eowner, Taxpayerno, Filepath, Filename, CategoryId, Notes from customers where CustomerID = #{customerid,jdbcType=CHAR}
